page.title: 15HOUSING IN SOUTH NORMANTON
page.content: In our survey of{Pinxton}and South Normanton we asked about methods of heating and cooking.Here are the results: {Main heat source:}The most common heat source{(27%)}(50%)was gas cen.heating. Second{(23%)}(29%)was solid fuel cen. heating.Other figures:gas fires{(15%) (8%).Oil fired cen.heating{(0%)}(0%) Electric storage heaters{(5%)}(2%), Electric fires{(4%)}(3%), Open fires{(11%)}(7%) {Cooking Fuel:}Most popular:Gas{(60%)} (52%),Electricity{(36%)}(36%), Mixture(Split Oven/Hob){(4%)}(7%), Solid Fuel{(0%)}(1%) {Occupants:}(Combined)2 occupants: 1% 3 occupants:16% 4 occupants:50% 5 occupants:26% 6 occupants: 6% 7 occupants: 1%
